itemDescription: wife of William Cavendish, 2nd Earl of Burlington, later 7th Duke of Devonshire

wikipedia_page.main: Blanche Cavendish, Countess of Burlington (née Howard; 11 January 1812 – 27 April 1840), was the wife of William Cavendish, 2nd Earl of Burlington, who would later become the 7th Duke of Devonshire.
